short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds formatting buttons above the text input box on the review page on Goodreads.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tired of clunky html tags when formatting your goodreads reviews? Here's an easy button based solution to add tags and format more easily.
